coupled with a bluetooth headset, the Talk’n Shoot will allow you to voice control your action cam.

For example, if you say « Start Vidéo » in your headset, the Talk’n Shoot commands you action cam And you get a instant vocal feedback « video OK » in your headset.

With the Talk’n Shoot, no need to use your hands to record your best moments.

what’s crazy about the Talk’n Shoot

1.Freedom: With the talk’n shoot, no need to do anything else than talk to control your action cam. What a real pleasure when you are skiing not to have to take your gloves off to start a movie.

2.Immediacy: with the Talk’n Shoot, no need to stop anymore to record your best movies. How many users could not turn their action cam on at the very right moment !!

3.Security: with the Talk’n Shoot, no need to perform dangerous moves anymore. For a biker, no need to take your hands off or even worse to look at in his rearview mirror to check if the red light flashes !!

4.No more disappointments: with the oral feedback of the Talk’n Shoot you’ll always know the status of your camera, you will no more find out afterwords that you missed the unmissable and unforgettable scene.
